name: guff
description: A no-nonsense extension of Knex migrations for use with PostgreSQL clients.
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:browser: rimraf dist/browser && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=browser babel src --out-dir dist/browser && npm run prettier:browser
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist/esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --out-dir dist/esm && npm run prettier:esm
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs && npm run prettier:cjs
scripts.watch: rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel ./src -w --out-dir dist/esm & cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel ./src -w --out-dir dist/cjs
